<title level="1" right="Rules">[Strikes](/Rules.aspx?ID=1606)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 32</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Your construct companion has two kinds of melee [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attacks. Its first unarmed attack deals 1d8 bludgeoning damage. Depending on the shape of your construct this could be a fist, tendril, or other similar unarmed attack. Its other unarmed attack deals 1d6 slashing or piercing damage (choose when you first gain the companion) and has the [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170) and [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179) traits. Depending on the shape of your construct, this could be a spine or spike, jaws or fangs, a retractable blade, or other similar unarmed attack.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
